name: Shan Gui 2 山桂贰
description:
As the autumn come, sweet osmanthus's fragrant is pervading Zijin Mountain again.
This is an AVG game produced by Magenta Factory, follow the story line of Shan Gui and Bai Qu, with an innovative mange-style display.
Whole story tells about He Jia and Han Hui's reunion, in the sweet and mild autumn season.
You will be guide by the girls, once again, enjoy a fantastic autumn journey of the ancient Chinese city of Nanjing.Key Features
  • AVG in mange-style
  • Verrrrrrrrrrrrry attractive bgm
  • With only one end
  • A relax and gentle story
